mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie ( title, ratings, director, genre, actors, running_time, openning_days, nation, poster_url, still1_url, still2_url, still3_url, still4_url, summary ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{ratings}, #{director}, #{genre}, #{actors}, #{runningTime}, #{openningDays}, #{nation}, #{posterUrl}, #{still1Url}, #{still2Url}, #{still3Url}, #{still4Url}, #{summary} )
mapper.select: SELECT movie_no, title, genre, nation, running_time, openning_days, director, actors, ratings, summary, poster_url, still1_url, still2_url, still3_url, still4_url, reg_date, enabled FROM movie WHERE movie_no = #{movieNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE movie SET title = #{title}, genre = #{genre}, nation = #{nation}, running_time = #{runningTime}, openning_days = #{openningDays}, director = #{director}, actors = #{actors}, ratings = #{ratings}, summary = #{summary}, poster_url = #{posterUrl}, still1_url = #{still1Url}, still2_url = #{still2Url}, still3_url = #{still3Url}, still4_url = #{still4Url}, reg_date = #{regDate}, enabled = #{enabled} WHERE movie_no = #{movieNo}
